{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Gemtek |model=WX-1520 |revision= |availability=OEM |type=access point |fcc_id=MXF-WX1500,MXF-WX1501,MXF-WX1520 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |cpu1_brand=No Wires Needed |cpu1_model=Poldhu |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Atmel |fla1_model=AT49BV1614T |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=EliteMT |ram1_model=M12L16161A |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=No Wires Needed |wi1_chip1_model=Poldhu |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=HFA3861 |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model=HFA3683 |wi1_sstreams= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_cpu=true |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |default_ssid= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |802dot11_protocols=b |flags=schematics |oui= }}'''No Wires Needed''' Parrot 1148 AP?
[[D-Link DWL-1000AP]] (MXF-WX1520)
Schematics are available under the documents for FCC ID MXF-WX1500.
The internal photos show the device with a different chip than the schematics dictate (Lucent 10/100 PHY).
